text: Ricardo Samuel Lucarelli Santos de Souza (born February 14, 1992) is a Brazilian volleyball player. He is a member of the Brazil national volleyball team and Brazilian club Funvic Taubat√©. He competed on the winning volleyball team at the 2016 Summer Olympics. == References == * http://poland2014.fivb.org/en/competition/teams/bra-brazil/players/ricardo- lucarelli-santos-de-souza?id=40937 Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian volleyball players Category:Competitors at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Minas Gerais
title: Ricardo Lucarelli
